thread.title: Vir Das's video on making viral videos goes viral and it is hilarious
thread.title_full: Vir Das's video on making viral videos goes viral and it is hilarious - Bangalore Mirror

author: bangaloremirror.com
title: Vir Das's video on making viral videos goes viral and it is hilarious
text:
Going viral is the 'in' thing for netizans. The trend of viral videos has gone so far that from a product launch to DIY instruction, viral video is the solution for them. Be it a superstar or anyone, all they want is a viral video and they are sorted.
Ever wondered how videos go viral? Never mind, Vir Das just made it easy for you with the video on 'How to make a viral video'
No wonder this video is going viral...
